unnormalised: Hey! Mental health apps are quite interesting, right? Heard my cousin Priya in Chennai uses one. Wonder if it's as effective as chai with a friend. I mean, for some, it might be good, like after a stressful Diwali party. But therapy with Dr. Sharma at AIIMS seems better for serious issues. Still, nice to have options beyond just praying at the temple! Maybe it even helps during Onam!
